name: Face Pop X: AR Emoji For Fun
name_original: Face Pop X: AR Emoji For Fun
description:
This game was initially built to bring laughter and joy to our 2 year old daughter. Seeing as how much she enjoys it, we have decided to share this to the world so that you too can have great time with your family.

* Fun music
* Make funny emoji faces with your very own face
* Record your game, review and laugh all the way
* Share with friends on social media
* Facial exercise, even your face needs a workout
* Get high score by doing as many face as you can

Enjoy the smiles and endless laughter. A game for the family, for everyone.

"This app is so much fun! You have to laugh at yourself! And if you like emoji’s this is perfect because it’s YOU!! Genius!!!" -- Pam D

Background music by PlayOnLoop.com
